to clarify, this website owner won't do anything. but the data will be given over (because it HAS to be available by law) and the people who make content do in fact use this data to decide what kind of stuff they make. So your favorite authors and their companies go "hey, NTR is up, lets put out more of that this year"

@Nat123 yes, thats more or less how it works. All websites do it, but free porn sites like this are very particular about it. You can go look up statistics of "Free porn" sites and find out they do track who watches what where and what fetishes, etc. So yeah. Its not something that is immediate, but if at the end of the year the companies that produce said content see "Oh wow, look how much interest NTR got" they are gonna produce more, because thats where the majority of clicks and interest lie, the end of the day goal is to make money, traffic= revenue, even on a free site, ergo all the spam bots you see lately.

okay, I am going to try to explain this nicely to the people who hate on NTR. It's to your benefit to read this. By commenting "kill all cucks" "hate NTR" etc. you are sending statistics to the algorithms to encourage more of this. Analytics are in play to determine what kind of content to make and such, the programs don't have time to analyze what you say, only that there is a lot of action and interest in whatever is getting comments. Doesn't matter if its good or bad. If you really want less of this stuff around, BLACK LIST YOUR TAGS. USE IT. By commenting and always spamming, you are only making things worse for yourselves. It really shouldn't be that hard to understand, but for whatever reason this whole spam war is going on and all it does is just make things better...for whatever content you are hating on.
